metadata.title: CVE-2020-36422 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.23.0. A side channel allows recovery of an ECC private key, related to mbedtls_ecp_check_pub_priv, mbedtls_pk_parse_key, mbedtls_pk_parse_keyfile, mbedtls_ecp_mul, and mbedtls_ecp_mul_restartable.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
